page.title: 18Hersham Shopping Centre
page.content: One of the most recent changes in the area is the building of the shopping centre in Hersham, on the site of the old abbattoir. The centre is quite large, built around a pedestrian precinct with a large car park near by. The brick built buildings are made more attractive by the plants and benches which are dotted around. We interviewed several people shopping there and found that they all thought it had been an exellent idea adding to the community feeling. Several people had met old friends again, and most found it a cheaper and more pleasant place in which to shop. There is an assortment of shops, the largest being Safeways Supermarket. But still there seems to be a need for a large department store, as most people still have to travel to Kingdton, Guilford or Staines for major items .
